Achievement.Title: Recurring Nightmare
Achievement.Description: Face your biggest fears and keep your sanity

Achievement.Description: Gain access to Arkham Mansion after it is locked down by the Joker

Achievement.Title: Daydreamer
Achievement.Description: Survive the nightmare of the Scarecrow's fear gas

Achievement.Title: Just What The Doctors Ordered
Achievement.Description: Save all the doctors in Medical

Achievement.Title: Malpractice Needs More Practice
Achievement.Description: Survive the onslaught from the deformed Joker henchman
